title: Esquire UK Script Font
content:
Hi all, I'm wondering what script has been used on the covers of UK Esquire – the script font reading 'Inside!' and 'Exclusive Interview' in the example attached.

[http://assets.esquire.co.uk/images/uploads/fourbythree/\_1440\_43/jose-mou...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060259/http:/assets.esquire.co.uk/images/uploads/fourbythree/_1440_43/jose-mourinho-esquire-cover-43.jpg "http://assets.esquire.co.uk/images/uploads/fourbythree/\_1440\_43/jose-mourinho-esquire-cover-43.jpg")

Many thanks!

Font: 

 Mission Script 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060259/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: ashleyh2

comments.content: That was quick Ryuk, thank you very much!
